The string is a new Elixir NanoWeb, with 10 to 46 gauge stretched.The pickup has been replaced with the rear only gibson burst backer. Because there is no tester, I do not know the type of burst backer, but not only winding strings but also plain strings are sticky, there is a clear distortion method where the core of sound remains It is with a soft case.There are fine scratches, but it is in very good condition.Please check photos that show the main damages and flaws on the item.
